statements: SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant_name FROM pollutants WHERE pollutant_type = 'Gas';
SELECT facility_name, pollutant_name, discharge_amount FROM pollutants ORDER BY discharge_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT pollutant_type FROM pollutants;
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE pollutant_type = 'Liquid' OR discharge_amount > 100;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant_name, discharge_amount FROM pollutants WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE discharge_amount > 1000 ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant_type, SUM(discharge_amount) AS total_discharge FROM pollutants GROUP BY facility_name, pollutant_type;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, pollutant_name, discharge_amount FROM pollutants WHERE pollutant_type = 'Chemical' ORDER BY discharge_amount DESC;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant_name, discharge_amount FROM pollutants WHERE facility_name LIKE '%chemical%' OR facility_name LIKE '%factory%';
SELECT * FROM pollutants;
SELECT pollutant_name, discharge_amount FROM pollutants;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE industry_type = 'Chemical';
SELECT id, facility_id, pollutant_name, discharge_amount FROM pollutants WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE id = 2;
SELECT pollutant_name, discharge_amount FROM pollutants WHERE discharge_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE industry_type = 'Manufacturing' ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, pollutant_name FROM facilities JOIN pollutants ON facilities.id = pollutants.facility_id WHERE facilities.location = 'New York' AND pollutants.discharge_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM pollutants;
SELECT facility_name, amount FROM pollutants WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT facility_name, regulator FROM facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE approval_granted = true;
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant_name, amount FROM pollutants WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT facilities.facility_name, pollutants.pollutant_name, regulations.permitted_amount FROM facilities JOIN pollutants ON facilities.id = pollutants.id JOIN regulations ON pollutants.pollutant_name = regulations.pollutant_name WHERE regulations.approval_granted = true ORDER BY regulations.permitted_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM pollutants INNER JOIN facilities ON pollutants.facility_name = facilities.facility_name WHERE pollutants.amount > 500 ORDER BY pollutants.amount DESC, facilities.location;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM pollutants GROUP BY facility_name HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM pollutants;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant_name FROM pollutants WHERE discharge_amount > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, MAX(discharge_amount) AS max_discharge_amount FROM pollutants GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_facilities FROM facilities;
SELECT region_name, country, total_pollutants_count FROM regions WHERE total_pollutants_count < 10;
SELECT * FROM pollutants ORDER BY discharge_amount DESC, discharge_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT facility_name, pollutant_name, discharge_amount FROM pollutants WHERE facility_name LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY discharge_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, region_name, country FROM facilities JOIN regions ON facilities.id = regions.id WHERE facilities.location = 'XYZ' ORDER BY region_name ASC;

SELECT facility_name, industry_type, SUM(discharge_amount) AS total_discharge FROM facilities JOIN pollutants ON facilities.id = pollutants.id GROUP BY facility_name, industry_type ORDER BY total_discharge DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM regulations WHERE description LIKE '%emission%' ORDER BY regulation_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM pollutants;
SELECT pollutant_name, amount FROM pollutants WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT facility_id, COUNT(*) AS total_pollutants FROM pollutants GROUP BY facility_id;
SELECT pollutants.pollutant_name, facilities.name FROM pollutants JOIN facilities ON pollutants.facility_id = facilities.id;
SELECT * FROM discharges ORDER BY quantity DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM pollutants ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT facility_id, pollutant_name, amount FROM pollutants WHERE facility_id = 2;
SELECT facilities.name, SUM(discharges.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM facilities JOIN discharges ON facilities.id = discharges.facility_id GROUP BY facilities.name;
SELECT pollutants.pollutant_name, discharges.quantity, discharges.date FROM pollutants JOIN discharges ON pollutants.id = discharges.pollutant_id WHERE quantity > 1000 AND date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulations.max_allowable_quantity, countries.name AS country_name FROM regulations JOIN countries ON regulations.country_id = countries.id WHERE max_allowable_quantity < 500.0;
